column.name: monster_spawner_id
column.valueComputed: SELECT monster_spawner_id FROM REPOSITORY.monster_spawner WHERE level=1 AND monster_class_id IN (SELECT monster_class_id FROM REPOSITORY.monster_class WHERE code='GREY_RAT') AND monster_type_id IN (SELECT monster_type_id FROM REPOSITORY.monster_type WHERE code='NORMAL')

column.name: character_stat_id
column.valueComputed: SELECT character_stat_id FROM REPOSITORY.character_stat WHERE code='HP'
